name: Check if user can create, read, update and delete a record
id: testing-different-request-on-the-student-application:Check if user can create, read, update and delete a record

testSteps.description: When User creates a new student providing "Prime" "prime1" "prime1@gmail.com" "Computer Science" "JAVA" "Ruby"

children.description: Creating student with firstName : Prime, lastName: prime1, email: 30190prime1@gmail.com, programme: Computer Science and courses: [JAVA, Ruby]

testSteps.description: Then verifies that the student with email"prime1@gmail.com" is created
And updates the created record with new email using PUT request and details "Prime" "prime1" "Computer Science" "JAVA" "Ruby"
And deletes the updated record using id
And verifies that the record is deleted
When User creates a new student providing "Sam" "Mandes" "prime12@gmail.com" "Computer Science" "JAVA" "Ruby"

children.description: Creating student with firstName : Sam, lastName: Mandes, email: 97828prime12@gmail.com, programme: Computer Science and courses: [JAVA, Ruby]

testSteps.description: Then verifies that the student with email"prime12@gmail.com" is created
And updates the created record with new email using PUT request and details "Sam" "Mandes" "Computer Science" "JAVA" "Ruby"
And deletes the updated record using id
And verifies that the record is deleted
When User creates a new student providing "Sam" "Mandes" "prime123@gmail.com" "Computer Engg" "php" "C#"

children.description: Creating student with firstName : Sam, lastName: Mandes, email: 60438prime123@gmail.com, programme: Computer Engg and courses: [php, C#]

testSteps.description: Then verifies that the student with email"prime123@gmail.com" is created
And updates the created record with new email using PUT request and details "Sam" "Mandes" "Computer Engg" "php" "C#"
And deletes the updated record using id
And verifies that the record is deleted
